Class InputParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • InputParser

  • public class InputParser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class converts between the file-format description of jobs and our internal job representation. It strictly enforces the format specified in assignment spec.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Scanner inputStream
      Input stream of commands.

        public InputParser(java.util.Scanner input)

    • Method Detail

      • ensureNext

        private void ensureNext(java.lang.String token)
        Ensures that next token in the input stream is exactly what we expect it to be and consumes it. Will throw an exception on mismatch or read error.
        Parameters:
        token - Expected token, which input must match exactly.

      • parseJobs

        public java.util.List<Job> parseJobs()
        Read all of the input stream and return parsed data. May throw an exception if the input is malformed.
        Returns:
        List of jobs, converted into our internal format.
